name: Starship Troopers: Invasion "Mobile Infantry"
description:
We are very excited to include many awesome new features in this update, along with two new action buttons in the main game we are introducing an all new first person shooter styled game that allows you to take on bugs in a whole different way!

We have listened to our fans and our new in game add-on "Trig's Mission" is a shooting gallery inspired sniper mini game for a fun new way to play while racking up fed credits for those who just want to get in and blast bugs!

The new "Bug Spray" button allows you to effectively stop all bugs from attacking and killing them dead! And don't worry it can be used at any time it's fully charged so you always have a life line if you get stuck!

Our new "Regenerate" button that replenishes health at the tap of a button, no more need to rack up health drops on your way to the fight. This button will recharge after every use to give you a better chance at making it out alive!

Along with our last update we've improved the overall responsiveness of the swiping feature for movement and targeting control.

Built using the most recent version of Unity3 similarly used by such popular games as Dead Trigger 2 and Call of Duty®: Strike Team for optimized graphics and game engine performance.

Optimized for for iOS 7 and the Retina display on iPad 3 & 4 and the new iPad Air and iPad Mini Retina including iPhone 5, 5S, 5C and iPod touch 5th gen wide screen displays. Works great on iPhone 4, 4S, iPad 2 and iPad mini as well!

Thank you again everyone for the invaluable input! There's tons of great reasons to download the game today, so jump in!

For the first time ever in the history of Starship Troopers, the franchise comes to the mobile gaming platform on your iPad, iPhone and iPod touch!

Experience the excitement of taking out giant space arachnids, or as we Marines like to call them, "BUGS!" In this fast-paced arcade style shooter, your marine drops into action, fitted with the all-new Federation Power Suit and a mass assortment of military ordinance. Join your fellow Marines to prove your worth as a true Roughneck as you engage with bug after bug in this prequel to the recent hit film by acclaimed anime director (and lifelong Starship Troopers fan!) Shinji Aramaki.

Stay on the course and avoid the barrage of obstacles in your way as you traverse your way through mazes of destruction and surprises around every corner. If you can make it out alive, your name will go down in history! Stay sharp Marine and remember, everyone fights, no one quits!

Hoo Rah!
